layout.singingstanza: We all have one Fa -- ther, one God cre -- at -- ed us. We all have one Fa -- ther, one God cre -- at -- ed us. Verse ten of Mal -- a -- chi chap -- ter two de -- clares that We all have one Fa -- ther, one God cre -- at -- ed us. We all have one Fa -- ther, one God cre -- at -- ed us.

lyrics.stanza: We all have one Father, one God created us. We all have one Father, one God created us. Verse ten of Malachi chapter two declares that We all have one Father, one God created us. We all have one Father, one God created us.
